sections.heading: Audits of cities and towns; posting; budget; accepting audit results9-481
sections.text: Audits of cities and towns; posting; budget; accepting audit resultsA. The governing body of each incorporated city or town shall cause an audit to be made by a certified public accountant who is currently certified by the Ari
